data.name: Space Leprechaun - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
This is the author's soundtracks released by our good friend, he agreed to provide them for free download to anyone who bought our game, since music should be written for the soul, and he did not want to take money for it. Soundtracks are presented in mp3 format - for listening on the Steam player, at the highest quality (320Kbs), so that you can get the maximum sound quality if you want to use them in the player.

Track list:

1. Live to survive 3:57
2. Space trip 5:00
3. Feel Love 3:53
4. Сloud castle 3:18
5. Candy dreams 2:54
6. Hover above vanity 4:11
7. Sense of pulse 3:23

data.short_description: Original soundtracks released by our good friend, he agreed to provide them for free to anyone who buys our game, as music should be written for the soul, and he didn't want to take the money for it.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: amd AtlonX64 or intel Celerone
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics3000
  • Storage: 1140 MB available space
  • Sound Card: integrated
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: amd a10-5700 or intel core i3-2100
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 7660G or Intel HD Graphics 620
  • Storage: 1140 MB available space
  • Sound Card: integrated

  • Storage: 80 MB available space
  • Sound Card: integrated
